org.hps.online.recon

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.online.recon.Server

  • public final class Server
extends Object
    Server for managing reconstruction Station instances Accepts commands from the Client and sends back a JSON result. The server will fail to start if the ET system does not open, and it will automatically shutdown if the ET connection goes down.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Server.ClientTask
      Handles a single client request.
      (package private) class  Server.EtMonitor
      This is run on a thread executor to continuously monitor the ET system and exit the application if it goes down.
